Articles.Content:
Hello,

After getting my crash issue handled, I wanted to give KSP the ultimate test: Launch an 800 ton station into 130km orbit. It will serve as a fuel stop for my future SSTOs. No solar panels, just nuke power. Anyway, it worked amazing the 1st time! The only downside is I need to make the orbiter stage de-orbit itself now. Once that's done I will post a link to the download. Enjoy!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited August 3, 2014 by TheBarnetts
Impressive. My biggest lifter puts 300 tonnes to LKO. But it doesn't look like that launcher is reusable. How much did it cost on the pad?
Cost? Did it in sandbox. I guess I have a new challenge!
